title: Drawing, ""View of a Paris street"", 1913
medium: Graphite on paper, mounted on cardboard
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Griffith Baily Coale
description: vertical rectangle. View looking accross a Paris boulevard, with a priest and numerous other figures in the scene.  Bare trees in the center strip dividing the street.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, ""View of a Paris street"", 1913.
1913. Graphite on paper, mounted on cardboard. Gift of Mrs. Griffith Baily Coale. 1962-135-1.
